metadata.title: CVE-2022-40090 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in function TIFFReadDirectory libtiff before 4.4.0allows attackers to cause a denial of service via crafted TIFF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff-tools - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiffxx6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-5ubuntu1').
